item.description:
Thanks to Marta!

Mela Kodi and I will attempt an hour-long (+/-) hike/walk/snowshoe on whatever trails are packed enough for Mela to navigate... currently assuming the non-maintained 'summer'roads and the Acorn trail near the radio tower. We might even venture into the Wrentham State Forest.

Equipment: Appropriate-for-conditions attire, water, leashes and traction aids and/or snowshoes.

I'm guessing that this will be an easy walk/snowshoe. Will limit to six dogs.

We'll meet at the parking lot located on High Rock Rd located off Rt.1 (Washington Rd)
Approx GPS: 42.06522, -71.28719

As always, if you have recent insight about conditions of trails, parking or hazards, please let me know!

Trail map at the following:

http://www.mass.gov/d...

Park info at the following:

http://www.mass.gov/d...
item.name: F. (Forest) Gilbert Hills State Forest
